1.1.functional_requirement: - Implement the entry point for The App.

2.1.functional_requirement: - The App should take a file name of The OpenAPI Spec as the only positional argument.

2.2.functional_requirement: - If "--remove-descriptions" command line parameter is present, The App should remove from The Subset all descriptions which are only meant to be read by humans.

2.3.functional_requirement:
- If "--remove-extensions" command line parameter is present, The App should remove from The Subset all OpenAPI Extensions, that is, custom properties that start with x-.
  - An example of such extension is "x-readme", an OpenAPI extension from ReadMe.

2.4.functional_requirement: - The App should output The Subset to standard output in json format.

2.5.functional_requirement:
- If "--yaml" command line parameter is present, The App should output The Subset to standard output in yaml format.
  - By default keys should not be quoted in the output yaml.
